author: freep.com
title: Game thread: Detroit Red Wings vs. Tampa Bay Lightning
text:
MORE Tonight's game information
Detroit Red Wings (2-0-0) vs. Tampa Bay Lightning (3-0-0)
When: 7:30 p.m.
Where: Joe Louis Arena, Detroit
TV: NBCSN
Radio: List of Red Wings' radio affiliates
Game notes: It's a rematch of last year's first round playoff matchup, won by the Lightning in a thrilling 4-3 series victory. ... Both teams enter tonight undefeated. The Wings opened with a 4-0 home win over Toronto and a 4-3 victory at Carolina. Meanwhile, the Lightning defeated Philadelphia, Buffalo and Boston, with the latter two wins coming on the road. ... Wings forward Justin Abdelkader was named the NHL's star of the opening week after tallying four goals, including a hat trick against the Leafs, and the winning goal in Carolina the following night. ... The Lightning have a powerful offensive attack, led by Steven Stamkos and Tyler Johnson, and are solid in goal with Ben Bishop. They lead the NHL with 13 goals scored.
